name: Bikini Karate Babes: Warriors of Elysia
name_original: Bikini Karate Babes: Warriors of Elysia
description:
Bikini Karate Babes: Warriors of Elysia is an arcade-fighting game developed by Creative Edge Studios. It came out on 21-06-2011. Creative Edge Studios published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play Bikini Karate Babes: Warriors of Elysia on PC.
